languages.text: "Не спеши покидать меня, элантах. Прежде... ответь на вопрос. Знаю, многое мы обсудили, ты даже принял{mf||а} мой проступок. Но мне также известно и то, что разум и эмоции не всегда идут вместе. Теперь, когда бушующие волны опасностей стихли, и Комморра осталась далеко позади... Что ты думаешь обо мне?"

"Do not leave just yet, elantach. Before you do... answer my question. I know we have talked a great deal, and you have even accepted what I did. But I also know that the mind and the emotions are not always in accordance. Now that the raging waves of danger have died down and Commorragh has been left far behind... What are your thoughts of me?"
languages.original_text: "Не спеши покидать меня, элантах. Прежде... ответь на вопрос. Знаю, многое мы обсудили, ты даже принял{mf||а} мой проступок. Но мне также известно и то, что разум и эмоции не всегда идут вместе. Теперь, когда бушующие волны опасностей стихли, и Комморра осталась далеко позади... Что ты думаешь обо мне?"

traits.locale_text: "Don't leave just yet, elantach. Before you do... answer my question. I know that we've discussed a lot. and you had even accepted my misdeed. But I also know that the mind and the emotions are not always in concord. Now that the raging waves of danger have died down and Commorragh had been left far behind... What do you think about me?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Don't leave just yet, elantach. Before you do... answer my question. I know that we've discussed a lot. and you had even accepted my misdeed. traits.locale_text: "Do not leave just yet, elantach. Before you do... answer my question. I know we have talked a great deal, and you have even accepted what I did. But I also know that the mind and the emotions are not always in accordance. Now that the raging waves of danger have died down and Commorragh has been left far behind... What are your thoughts of me?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “先别急着走，外界人。在离开之前……回答我一个问题吧。我们曾促膝长谈，你甚至原谅了我的弥天大错，但我知道，人们的思想与情感并非总是一成不变。如今，危机的浪潮已经平息，科摩罗也已经成为了过去的故事……你现在是怎么看待我的？”
languages.original_text: "Do not leave just yet, elantach. Before you do... answer my question. I know we have talked a great deal, and you have even accepted what I did. But I also know that the mind and the emotions are not always in accordance. Now that the raging waves of danger have died down and Commorragh has been left far behind... What are your thoughts of me?"

traits.locale_text: “先别急着走，外界人。在离开之前……回答我一个问题吧。我们曾促膝长谈，你甚至原谅了我的弥天大错，但我知道，人们的思想与情感并非总是一成不变。如今，危机的浪潮已经平息，科摩罗也已经成为了过去的故事……你现在是怎么看待我的？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No te vayas aún, elantach. No sin... responder a mi pregunta. Sé que hemos hablado mucho, y que incluso has aceptado lo que hice. Pero también sé que la mente y las emociones no siempre están en consonancia. Ahora que la furiosa tempestad del peligro ha amainado y que Commorragh ha quedado atrás... Dime, ¿qué piensas de mí?».
languages.original_text: "Do not leave just yet, elantach. Before you do... answer my question. I know we have talked a great deal, and you have even accepted what I did. But I also know that the mind and the emotions are not always in accordance. Now that the raging waves of danger have died down and Commorragh has been left far behind... What are your thoughts of me?"

traits.locale_text: «No te vayas aún, elantach. No sin... responder a mi pregunta. Sé que hemos hablado mucho, y que incluso has aceptado lo que hice. Pero también sé que la mente y las emociones no siempre están en consonancia. Ahora que la furiosa tempestad del peligro ha amainado y que Commorragh ha quedado atrás... Dime, ¿qué piensas de mí?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ne partez pas tout de suite, elantach. J'ai une dernière question à vous poser. Je sais que nous avons beaucoup parlé et que vous avez même accepté ce que j'ai fait, mais je sais aussi que parfois, l'esprit et le cœur ne parviennent pas à s'accorder. Maintenant que le danger est derrière nous et que nous sommes bien loin de Commorragh... que pensez-vous de moi ? »
languages.original_text: "Do not leave just yet, elantach. Before you do... answer my question. I know we have talked a great deal, and you have even accepted what I did. But I also know that the mind and the emotions are not always in accordance. Now that the raging waves of danger have died down and Commorragh has been left far behind... What are your thoughts of me?"

traits.locale_text: « Ne partez pas tout de suite, elantach. J'ai une dernière question à vous poser. Je sais que nous avons beaucoup parlé et que vous avez même accepté ce que j'ai fait, mais je sais aussi que parfois, l'esprit et le cœur ne parviennent pas à s'accorder. Maintenant que le danger est derrière nous et que nous sommes bien loin de Commorragh... que pensez-vous de moi ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Geht noch nicht, Elantach. Vorher ... beantwortet meine Frage. Ich weiß, wir hatten lange Gespräche, und Ihr habt sogar akzeptiert, was ich getan habe. Aber ich weiß auch, dass Verstand und Gefühle nicht immer im Einklang sind. Da die tobenden Wellen der Gefahr sich nun gelegt haben und Commorragh weit hinter uns liegt ... was denkt Ihr über mich?"
languages.original_text: "Do not leave just yet, elantach. Before you do... answer my question. I know we have talked a great deal, and you have even accepted what I did. But I also know that the mind and the emotions are not always in accordance. Now that the raging waves of danger have died down and Commorragh has been left far behind... What are your thoughts of me?"

traits.locale_text: "Geht noch nicht, Elantach. Vorher ... beantwortet meine Frage. Ich weiß, wir hatten lange Gespräche, und Ihr habt sogar akzeptiert, was ich getan habe. Aber ich weiß auch, dass Verstand und Gefühle nicht immer im Einklang sind. Da die tobenden Wellen der Gefahr sich nun gelegt haben und Commorragh weit hinter uns liegt ... was denkt Ihr über mich?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「まだ立ち去らないでくれ、エランタ。去る前に…我の質問に答えてくれ。我らはたくさん話をした。お前が我のしたことを受け入れてくれたことも知っている。だが、その意志と感情が必ずしも一致するものではないことも知っている。荒れ狂う危険の波が静まり、コモラフは遥か彼方にある今…お前は我について、どう考えているのだ？」
languages.original_text: "Do not leave just yet, elantach. Before you do... answer my question. I know we have talked a great deal, and you have even accepted what I did. But I also know that the mind and the emotions are not always in accordance. Now that the raging waves of danger have died down and Commorragh has been left far behind... What are your thoughts of me?"

traits.locale_text: 「まだ立ち去らないでくれ、エランタ。去る前に…我の質問に答えてくれ。我らはたくさん話をした。お前が我のしたことを受け入れてくれたことも知っている。だが、その意志と感情が必ずしも一致するものではないことも知っている。荒れ狂う危険の波が静まり、コモラフは遥か彼方にある今…お前は我について、どう考えているのだ？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hemen gitme elantach. Gitmeden önce sana bir sorum var. Pek çok şey konuştuğumuzu ve yaptıklarımı kabullendiğini biliyorum. Fakat zihindekilerle duyguların her zaman aynı olmadığını da biliyorum. Şimdi tehlike dalgaları sakinleştiğine ve Commorragh çok uzaklarda kaldığına göre... Benim hakkımda ne düşünüyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Do not leave just yet, elantach. Before you do... answer my question. I know we have talked a great deal, and you have even accepted what I did. But I also know that the mind and the emotions are not always in accordance. Now that the raging waves of danger have died down and Commorragh has been left far behind... What are your thoughts of me?"

traits.locale_text: "Hemen gitme elantach. Gitmeden önce sana bir sorum var. Pek çok şey konuştuğumuzu ve yaptıklarımı kabullendiğini biliyorum. Fakat zihindekilerle duyguların her zaman aynı olmadığını da biliyorum. Şimdi tehlike dalgaları sakinleştiğine ve Commorragh çok uzaklarda kaldığına göre... Benim hakkımda ne düşünüyorsun?"
